games.title: Dungeon Master - Cult & Craft
games.description:
Become a dungeon keeper, control stickmen, mine ore, develop a Cult and hold power in this exciting 3D simulator! Develop the Cult, manage resources and expand the boundaries of your underground Universe!

‚õè Resource extraction - send followers for ore and minerals.
üèõ Cult development - maintain loyalty at a high level.
üëÄ Captivating 3D graphics - fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of darkness.
‚öí Dungeon upgrade - build, improve and strengthen your base.
üí∞ Economic strategy ‚Äì distribute the spoils and increase wealth.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
WASD / arrow keys / drag left mouse button = move
Left mouse button / E = select upgrade

Mobile:
In-game joystick = move
tap = select upgrade

games.title: Ragdoll Soccer
games.description: Enter the thrilling world of Ragdoll Soccer, where you command a stick figure footballer in exciting games. Aim to outscore rivals and become a champion, whether playing alone or with a friend, offering nonstop enjoyment on your phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
Play football with a stickman! A fun 2D sports game for one or two players!
Control the stickman like a doll and hit the ball to score a goal against the opponent.

Features of the game:
 - single player mode
- local multiplayer for two players
 - Championship mode
 - The game has boosters and abilities!
 - penalty shootout mode

To play with a PC, you can use:
- keyboard (WASD +QE)
- mouse
- gamepad
To play from your phone, use touch input

games.title: TCG Shop: Maps, Toys and Comics
games.description:
Open your own store in the new trading simulator! Sell TCG cards, figures, comics, food, collectibles, toys - everything geeks and fans love. Serve customers, restock shelves, manage the cash register, deliver orders and expand your business. Upgrade your store, unlock new items, hire employees and build a shopping empire!

This game about store combines elements of simulator, clicker and business game, will suit fans of economic strategies, management and TCG-cards. Simple controls, bright graphics and the excitement of business development make the game exciting and accessible to everyone.

Try to become the best merchant and expand your store to the level of the legendary marketplace! Play online for free right in your browser. Perfect for fans of store simulators, card games, shipping and business pumping.
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to the store simulator! This is where you are in charge!

Main Actions:
- Click on the goods to put them on the shelves.
- Improve the store by opening new departments.
- Create your own merch, comics and even food!

games.title: Alpha Balls
games.description: Alpha Balls is a stimulating word puzzle game that sharpens your mind and vocabulary. Enjoy it online for free on any device. Solve puzzles to earn coins for hints, making it an entertaining and educational challenge for all.
games.howToPlayText: Make words from letters. The hint can show you the first letters of an answer. If you press the bin, the additional letters that mislead you will be removed. Press the ball with a tick to confirm your answer and earn coins. You can spend coins for hints.
